casebody.data:
Cellous JACKSON, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. S/S ALCOA COMMANDER, her engines, tackle, furniture and apparel; and Alcoa Steamship Company, Inc., Defendants-Appellants. No. 29824

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 9, 1970. Ralph E. Smith, Christopher Tompkins, New Orleans, La., for defendants-appellants. *693Clifton S. Carl, New Orleans, La., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before GEWIN, GOLDBERG, and DYER, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 F.2d 966 (5 Cir. 1970).
